summary: The Veterans Health Administration operates one of the nation's largest health care systems—serving millions of veterans. In 2024, VHA reorganized to eliminate overlap and fragmentation of responsibilities across its offices that oversee compliance, risk management, internal audits, and medical investigations. Among other things, the reorganization highlighted VHA's need for a workforce plan. Having a plan would help ensure these offices have the staff they need...
title: Veterans Health Administration: Additional Actions Needed to Improve Oversight of Health Care System
